name: Troilus Gold Corp.
longDescription: Troilus Gold Corp is a Toronto-based, Quebec focused, advanced stage exploration and early-development company. It is focused on the mineral expansion and potential mine re-start of the former gold and copper Troilus mine. The Troilus property [approximately 83,385-hectare] is located Northeast of the Val-d'Or district, within the Frotet-Evans Greenstone Belt in Quebec, Canada.

fullAddress: 36 Lombard Street,4th Floor, Toronto, ON, CA
